summary: Build a fast, responsive, mobile-friendly, text-heavy Government Job Notification website for Indian students (similar to Sarkari Result) featuring job listings, per-post syllabus downloads, important link buttons, and categorized sections for Latest Jobs, Admit Cards, and Results.
architectural_notes: Prioritize fast loading with a simple, text-heavy, mobile-first responsive design.
Include a lightweight top announcement/ticker bar (scrolling text) without impacting page load speed.

existing_features.title: Build a mobile-friendly, text-heavy homepage that displays three clearly separated sections (columns on desktop, stacked boxes on mobile) for: Latest Jobs, Admit Cards, and Results. Each section must show a fast-loading list of posts with Job Name, Start Date, Last Date, and Fees, and each list item must link to a dedicated post detail page.

Create a post detail page for each job/admit card/result that includes: (1) the job title, (2) an 'Important Dates' area showing Start Date and Last Date, (3) a Fees area, (4) an 'Important Links' section with direct buttons for 'Apply Online', 'Download Notification', and 'Official Website' that open the provided URLs, and (5) a 'Syllabus' section where users can view the syllabus link and download it (via direct file link).

Integrate frontend data fetching with the backend using React Query, including loading/empty/error states optimized for fast perceived performance. Ensure the UI remains usable on slow connections (text-first rendering, minimal blocking UI).

Apply a coherent, simple visual theme suitable for a government exam notification portal (text-heavy, high-contrast, readable typography, clear section headers, and compact tables/lists). Use a restrained color palette (avoid blue/purple) and keep styling consistent across homepage and detail pages.

Add a prominent, site-wide scrolling notice/ticker (marquee-style) at the top of the website (in the shared header layout) that continuously scrolls left-to-right or right-to-left and displays an English daily-update message indicating users do not need to update and should visit daily for new updates (e.g., "No need to update â€” visit here daily for new updates."). The ticker must be visible on both the homepage and post detail pages and remain readable and mobile-friendly.

new_feature_requests.summary: Homepage/job listings showing Job Name, Important Dates (Start & Last), and Fees
Per-job post detail page with Important Links buttons: Apply Online, Download Notification, Official Website
Syllabus section per exam/job with view and download capability
Category layout with separate columns/boxes for Latest Jobs, Admit Cards, and Results
Simple, mobile-friendly, text-heavy UI optimized for fast loading

Implement backend data models and query APIs for government job-style posts, including: Job Name, Important Dates (Start Date and Last Date), Fees, Category (Latest Jobs / Admit Cards / Results), Syllabus (view/download URL), and Important Links (Apply Online, Download Notification, Official Website). Provide endpoints to (a) list posts optionally filtered by category and (b) fetch a single post by id.
Add a top scrolling notice/ticker (marquee-style) on the website with a daily-update message (e.g., 'No need to update; visit here daily')
